Scripts.OnClick: ZMobDB_ChangeBoxSize(self);
ZMobDB_ChangeBoxPosition("up");
ZMobDB_ChangeBoxPosition("left");
ZMobDB_ChangeBoxPosition("right");
ZMobDB_ChangeBoxPosition("down");
ZMobDB_ChangeIconPosition("up");
ZMobDB_ChangeIconPosition("left");
ZMobDB_ChangeIconPosition("right");
ZMobDB_ChangeIconPosition("down");

ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.profile=self.profile ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail:SetText(self.stringName) ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_CopyButton:Enable() ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_DeleteButton:Enable()

ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.profile=self.profile ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail:SetText(self.stringName) ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_CopyButton:Enable() ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_DeleteButton:Enable()

ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.profile=self.profile ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail:SetText(self.stringName) ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_CopyButton:Enable() ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_DeleteButton:Enable()

ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.profile=self.profile ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail:SetText(self.stringName) ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_CopyButton:Enable() ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_DeleteButton:Enable()

ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.profile=self.profile ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail:SetText(self.stringName) ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_CopyButton:Enable() ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_DeleteButton:Enable()

ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.profile=self.profile ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail:SetText(self.stringName) ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_CopyButton:Enable() ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_DeleteButton:Enable()

ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.profile=self.profile ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail:SetText(self.stringName) ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_CopyButton:Enable() ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_DeleteButton:Enable()

ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.profile=self.profile ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail:SetText(self.stringName) ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_CopyButton:Enable() ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_DeleteButton:Enable()

ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.profile=self.profile ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail:SetText(self.stringName) ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_CopyButton:Enable() ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_DeleteButton:Enable()

ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.profile=self.profile ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail:SetText(self.stringName) ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_CopyButton:Enable() ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_DeleteButton:Enable()

for index, entry in pairs(ZMobDB_Options_4) do ZMobDB_PasteProfile(index) end DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("ZMobDB:Pasting profile '"..ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_ProfileCopied.profile.."' over all Profiles");

if(ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.profile==ZMobDB_GetPlayerIndex())then DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("ZMobDB:You cannot delete your currently active Profile"); return end ZMobDB_DeleteProfile(ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.profile) DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("ZMobDB:Delete profile '"..ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.profile.."'.") ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.profile="" ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail:SetText("") ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.stringName="" ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_CopyButton:Disable() ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_DeleteButton:Disable() ZMobDB_UpdateProfileList(ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Scroller:GetValue())

if(ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_ProfileCopied.profile~="")then ZMobDB_PasteProfile(ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.profile) DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("ZMobDB:Pasting profile '"..ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_ProfileCopied.profile.."' over Profile '"..ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.profile.."'.") end

text="Copied profile: '"..ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail:GetText().."'" ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_ProfileCopied:SetText(text) ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_ProfileCopied.profile=ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.profile ZMobDB_CopyProfile(ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_Label_Detail.profile) ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_ExplodeButton:Enable() ZMobDB_Configuration_Profile_Panel_PasteButton:Enable()
ZMobDB_BackupProfile()
self:GetParent():Hide();
ZMobDB_Copyto_Dialog_Copy_to_name_box_Text:SetText(ZMobDB_GetOption("Settings","TargetData"));
ZMobDB_SetOption("Settings","CopyEntry",ZMobDB_Copyto_Dialog_Copy_to_name_box:GetText()); ZMobDB_copy_to();
ZMobDB_SetOption("Settings","CopyEntry",ZMobDB_Copyto_Dialog_Copy_to_name_box:GetText()); ZMobDB_copy_from();
